data.name: A Nerd who has sex with girls in "Another world" has  become a HERO Demo
data.detailed_description:
★Let's meet various girls in a another world!★

【Game content】
Travel in 6 areas of another world, meeting women of various races,
Let's leave offspring with them.

There is no difficult gameplay, it is a very simple game.
You can easily clear this game in a short time,
so it is suitable for those who want to see the illustrations of the characters immediately.

There are 28＋2 love scenes in the game,
the illustration of the pregnant version will be added.

You cannot win the battle in the trial version.
Also, you can only enter two maps.

fullgame.name: A Nerd who has sex with girls in "Another world" has  become a HERO

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows7 after
  • Processor: 2+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: central processing units (CPUs)
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows7 after
  • Processor: 2+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: central processing units (CPUs)
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
Have sex with women of various races in this game,
Elf, Amazones, Dragons, Demon, Centaurs, Furry, Angels.
And there are some depictions of sex without consent.
